description: Primes that contain digits 7 and 9 only.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index to entries about primes with digits in a given set
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(7977997) | Set(Intseq(p)) subset [7,9]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Jul 28 2012.
author: _David W. Wilson_
